title: Perform Electrical Thermography Inspection
description: An electrician uses a thermal imaging camera to inspect electrical switchgear for hot spots, which can indicate a poor connection and a fire risk.

tasks.description: Perform a thermography scan of the main electrical substation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Thermal images of all electrical cabinets are captured.

tasks.description: Analyze the thermal images and identify a connection on a circuit breaker that is significantly hotter than the others.
tasks.expected_outcome: A potential fire risk is identified.

tasks.description: Create a work order to de-energize the circuit and have an electrician clean and tighten the hot connection.
tasks.expected_outcome: A corrective work order is created to eliminate the fire hazard.
